name: Snake Plant
description: The Snake Plant (Sansevieria trifasciata) is one of the most popular and resilient houseplants. Known for its striking upright leaves with yellow edges, it's perfect for beginners and busy plant parents. This air-purifying champion thrives on neglect and can tolerate low light conditions.
shortDescription: Hardy air-purifying plant perfect for beginners
careInstructions: Water only when soil is completely dry. Prefers bright indirect light but tolerates low light.

name: Snake Plant Large
description: Large Snake Plant (Sansevieria trifasciata) specimen perfect for making a statement. This mature plant features the characteristic sword-like leaves with vibrant yellow margins. Excellent air purifier that removes toxins while requiring minimal care.
shortDescription: Large statement Snake Plant for instant impact
careInstructions: Water sparingly - every 2-3 weeks. Avoid overwatering.

name: ZZ Plant
description: The ZZ Plant (Zamioculcas zamiifolia) is virtually indestructible with glossy, dark green leaves that add elegance to any space. This drought-tolerant beauty thrives in low light and forgives forgotten waterings, making it ideal for offices and low-maintenance homes.
shortDescription: Glossy indestructible plant for low light spaces
careInstructions: Water monthly or when soil is dry. Extremely drought tolerant.

name: ZZ Plant Medium
description: Medium-sized ZZ Plant perfect for desks or shelves. Features the signature glossy leaves and requires almost no maintenance. This size offers great value for creating instant greenery without the commitment of regular plant care.
shortDescription: Medium ZZ Plant for desks and shelves
careInstructions: Water every 3-4 weeks. Allow soil to dry completely between waterings.

name: Spider Plant
description: The Spider Plant (Chlorophytum comosum) is a classic houseplant beloved for its arching green and white striped leaves and adorable plantlets. Safe for pets and excellent for beginners, it's perfect for hanging baskets or shelf displays.
shortDescription: Pet-safe classic with baby plantlets
careInstructions: Keep soil slightly moist. Bright indirect light preferred.

name: Golden Pothos
description: Golden Pothos (Epipremnum aureum) is the ultimate trailing plant with heart-shaped leaves splashed with golden yellow. This vigorous grower is perfect for hanging baskets or climbing moss poles. Extremely forgiving and adaptable to various light conditions.
shortDescription: Ultimate trailing plant with golden variegation
careInstructions: Allow top inch of soil to dry between waterings. Trim to maintain shape.

name: Golden Pothos Hanging
description: Beautiful trailing Golden Pothos in a hanging format. This established plant comes ready to display with cascading vines that will continue growing. Perfect for adding vertical interest and bringing life to empty corners.
shortDescription: Trailing Pothos ready for hanging display
careInstructions: Water when top soil feels dry. Pinch growing tips to encourage bushiness.

name: Peace Lily
description: The Peace Lily (Spathiphyllum) combines beautiful white blooms with lush green foliage. Known as one of the top air-purifying plants, it dramatically droops when thirsty, making watering timing easy. Perfect for adding elegance to any room.
shortDescription: White-flowering air purifier with dramatic watering signals
careInstructions: Water when leaves begin to droop slightly. Enjoys humidity.

name: Peace Lily Medium
description: Medium Peace Lily perfect for floor placement or large surfaces. This size typically produces more frequent blooms and creates a substantial presence. The white spaths contrast beautifully with dark green leaves.
shortDescription: Medium Peace Lily for substantial presence
careInstructions: Keep soil consistently moist but not soggy. Mist leaves regularly.

name: Rubber Plant
description: The Rubber Plant (Ficus elastica) features large, glossy burgundy and green leaves that make a bold statement. This fast-growing beauty adapts well to indoor conditions and can grow quite tall, making it perfect for filling empty corners.
shortDescription: Bold statement plant with glossy burgundy leaves
careInstructions: Water when top inch of soil is dry. Wipe leaves clean monthly.

name: Rubber Plant Medium
description: Medium Rubber Plant offering immediate impact with its large, glossy leaves. This size is perfect for creating a focal point while still being manageable for most spaces. Known for its air-purifying qualities.
shortDescription: Medium Rubber Plant for immediate impact
careInstructions: Bright indirect light preferred. Clean leaves with damp cloth monthly.

name: Monstera Deliciosa
description: The Instagram-famous Monstera Deliciosa features iconic split leaves that develop beautiful fenestrations as it matures. This tropical beauty is surprisingly easy to care for and makes an impressive statement in any modern home.
shortDescription: Instagram-famous plant with iconic split leaves
careInstructions: Bright indirect light. Water when top 2 inches of soil are dry.

name: Monstera Deliciosa Medium
description: Medium Monstera Deliciosa with developing fenestrations. This size shows the plant's characteristic splits and holes, making it perfect for those wanting the iconic Monstera look without waiting years for maturity.
shortDescription: Medium Monstera with developing split leaves
careInstructions: Provide moss pole for climbing support. Wipe leaves weekly.

name: Monstera with Moss Pole
description: Large Monstera Deliciosa trained on a moss pole, displaying the full glory of its split leaves. This statement piece brings tropical elegance and architectural interest to any space. Perfect for plant enthusiasts ready for a showstopper.
shortDescription: Large Monstera on moss pole - ultimate statement piece
careInstructions: Mist moss pole regularly. Train new growth onto pole.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: The trendy Fiddle Leaf Fig (Ficus lyrata) features large, violin-shaped leaves that create an instant designer look. While it requires more attention than other houseplants, its dramatic presence makes it worth the effort for dedicated plant parents.
shortDescription: Trendy designer plant with violin-shaped leaves
careInstructions: Consistent watering schedule essential. Bright indirect light only.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig Medium
description: Medium Fiddle Leaf Fig perfect for making a statement. This size showcases the plant's iconic large leaves while being manageable for most spaces. Requires consistent care but rewards with stunning architectural form.
shortDescription: Medium Fiddle Leaf Fig for statement displays
careInstructions: Avoid moving once established. Water consistently but avoid overwatering.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig Large
description: Large Fiddle Leaf Fig (1.6m tall) - the ultimate statement plant. This mature specimen features the full grandeur of large violin-shaped leaves. Perfect for those wanting instant impact and dramatic presence.
shortDescription: Ultimate statement Fiddle Leaf Fig - 1.6m tall
careInstructions: Premium care required. Stable environment essential.

name: Heart Leaf Philodendron
description: The Heart Leaf Philodendron is a classic trailing plant with glossy heart-shaped leaves. Extremely easy to grow and propagate, it's perfect for beginners wanting a lush, trailing display. Grows quickly and looks beautiful in hanging baskets.
shortDescription: Classic trailing plant with heart-shaped leaves
careInstructions: Bright indirect light. Allow soil to dry slightly between waterings.

name: Philodendron Brasil
description: Philodendron Brasil features stunning variegated leaves with splashes of lime green and yellow. This fast-growing trailer adds bright color to any space and is just as easy to care for as its solid green cousin.
shortDescription: Variegated trailing philodendron with lime green splashes
careInstructions: Bright light enhances variegation. Pinch tips to encourage bushiness.

name: Philodendron Pink Princess
description: The coveted Philodendron Pink Princess features stunning pink variegation on dark green leaves. Once extremely rare and expensive, this beauty is now more accessible while maintaining its status as a collector's favorite.
shortDescription: Coveted philodendron with stunning pink variegation
careInstructions: Bright light essential for pink coloration. Higher humidity preferred.

name: Bird of Paradise
description: The Bird of Paradise (Strelitzia reginae) produces spectacular orange and blue bird-like flowers. This South African native thrives in our climate and makes a stunning garden centerpiece. Mature plants bloom regularly with proper care.
shortDescription: Spectacular bird-like flowers - South African native
careInstructions: Full sun required for flowering. Deep watering twice weekly in summer.

name: Wild Banana Small
description: Small Strelitzia nicolai (Wild Banana) perfect for starting your tropical garden. This South African indigenous plant develops large paddle-shaped leaves and can eventually reach impressive heights. Ideal for creating tropical ambiance.
shortDescription: Small Wild Banana for tropical gardens
careInstructions: Protection from strong winds essential. Regular watering in growing season.

name: Wild Banana Medium
description: Medium Wild Banana showing developing tropical foliage. This indigenous beauty adapts well to South African conditions and creates instant tropical appeal. Perfect for patios and protected garden areas.
shortDescription: Medium Wild Banana with developing tropical foliage
careInstructions: Shelter from wind. Mulch around base to retain moisture.

name: Wild Banana Large
description: Large Wild Banana specimen for immediate tropical impact. This established plant brings instant drama to gardens and patios. Being indigenous to South Africa, it's well-adapted to our climate conditions.
shortDescription: Large Wild Banana for instant tropical impact
careInstructions: Wind protection crucial. Deep weekly watering in summer.

name: Clivia Bush Lily
description: Clivia miniata produces clusters of bright orange flowers in spring. This South African indigenous plant thrives in semi-shade and is perfect for areas where other plants struggle. Extremely hardy once established.
shortDescription: South African native with bright orange spring flowers
careInstructions: Semi-shade preferred. Drought tolerant once established.

name: Clivia Large Flowering
description: Large flowering Clivia specimen ready to bloom. These mature plants produce spectacular displays of orange flowers and are perfect for creating focal points in semi-shaded garden areas.
shortDescription: Large flowering Clivia for spectacular spring displays
careInstructions: Established plants very drought tolerant. Flowers best with winter rest.

name: Spekboom
description: Spekboom (Portulacaria afra) is a water-wise South African succulent perfect for xeriscaping. Known as the 'elephant bush', it's drought-tolerant, fast-growing, and excellent for sustainable gardening practices.
shortDescription: Water-wise South African succulent for xeriscaping
careInstructions: Extremely drought tolerant. Minimal watering required.

name: Lavender
description: Fragrant English Lavender produces beautiful purple flower spikes and aromatic foliage. Perfect for herb gardens, borders, and attracting beneficial insects. Thrives in South African conditions with minimal water.
shortDescription: Fragrant purple flowers perfect for herb gardens
careInstructions: Full sun essential. Allow soil to dry between waterings.

name: Rosemary
description: Aromatic Rosemary is essential for any herb garden. This hardy Mediterranean herb thrives in South African conditions and provides year-round fresh herbs for cooking. Drought-tolerant once established.
shortDescription: Essential aromatic herb for cooking
careInstructions: Well-draining soil essential. Pinch flowers to maintain leaf production.

name: Thyme
description: Common Thyme is a compact herb perfect for containers or herb gardens. This hardy perennial provides fresh herbs year-round and attracts beneficial insects. Very drought-tolerant once established.
shortDescription: Compact herb perfect for containers
careInstructions: Harvest regularly to encourage new growth. Very drought tolerant.

name: Oregano
description: Oregano is essential for Mediterranean cooking and thrives in South African gardens. This spreading herb produces small white flowers that attract bees. Harvest leaves throughout the growing season.
shortDescription: Essential Mediterranean herb for cooking
careInstructions: Pinch flowers to maintain leaf flavor. Spreads readily.

name: Sage
description: Garden Sage offers beautiful silver-green foliage and is essential for cooking. This hardy perennial herb thrives with minimal care and produces lovely purple flower spikes that attract pollinators.
shortDescription: Silver-green herb with purple flower spikes
careInstructions: Cut back after flowering. Very drought tolerant.

name: Mint
description: Fresh Mint is perfect for teas, cocktails, and cooking. This vigorous grower prefers moist conditions and some shade. Best grown in containers to prevent spreading throughout the garden.
shortDescription: Vigorous herb perfect for teas and cocktails
careInstructions: Keep soil moist. Contains spread by growing in pots.

name: Basil
description: Sweet Basil is essential for any herb garden. This annual herb produces aromatic leaves perfect for cooking and needs warm conditions to thrive. Pinch flowers to encourage leaf production.
shortDescription: Essential aromatic herb for Italian cooking
careInstructions: Warm conditions essential. Pinch flowers regularly.

name: Parsley
description: Flat-leaf Parsley provides fresh herbs for cooking year-round. This biennial herb prefers cooler conditions and some afternoon shade. Essential for any kitchen garden.
shortDescription: Fresh flat-leaf variety for cooking
careInstructions: Some afternoon shade appreciated. Harvest outer leaves first.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Aloe Vera is famous for its medicinal properties and ease of care. This succulent produces healing gel in its thick leaves and is perfect for sunny spots. Virtually indestructible once established.
shortDescription: Famous medicinal succulent with healing gel
careInstructions: Well-draining soil essential. Water deeply but infrequently.

name: Aloe Vera Medium
description: Medium Aloe Vera plant perfect for medicinal use. This size provides plenty of gel for first aid while being easy to manage. The thick succulent leaves store water making it extremely drought-tolerant.
shortDescription: Medium Aloe Vera perfect for medicinal use
careInstructions: Harvest outer leaves for gel. Extremely drought tolerant.

name: Jade Plant
description: The Jade Plant (Crassula ovata) is considered a symbol of good luck and prosperity. This easy-care succulent develops thick stems and glossy leaves, eventually becoming a miniature tree. Perfect for beginners.
shortDescription: Lucky plant that develops into miniature tree
careInstructions: Water when soil is completely dry. Can go weeks without water.

name: Jade Plant Medium
description: Medium Jade Plant showing developed structure. This size demonstrates the plant's tree-like growth habit with thick stems and branches. A living sculpture that improves with age.
shortDescription: Medium Jade Plant with tree-like structure
careInstructions: Ancient plants can survive months without water. Very low maintenance.

name: Echeveria Mixed
description: Beautiful rosette-forming Echeveria in various colors including pink, purple, and blue-green. These compact succulents are perfect for arrangements and container gardens. Low-maintenance and drought-tolerant.
shortDescription: Colorful rosette succulents perfect for arrangements
careInstructions: Bright light maintains colors. Water at soil level to avoid leaf rot.
column23: Beautiful rosette-forming Echeveria in various colors including pink, purple, and blue-green. These compact succulents are perfect for arrangements and container gardens. Low-maintenance and drought-tolerant.
column24: Colorful rosette succulents perfect for arrangements
column33: Bright light maintains colors. Water at soil level to avoid leaf rot.

name: Haworthia
description: Haworthia species form attractive small rosettes with interesting textures and patterns. These compact succulents are perfect for bright windowsills and require minimal care. Many varieties available.
shortDescription: Small rosette succulents with interesting patterns
careInstructions: Bright indirect light preferred. Water sparingly in winter.

name: String of Pearls
description: String of Pearls (Senecio rowleyanus) produces cascading stems of bead-like leaves. This unique trailing succulent is perfect for hanging baskets and adds interesting texture to succulent displays.
shortDescription: Cascading succulent with bead-like leaves
careInstructions: Hanging display preferred. Allow soil to dry completely between waterings.

name: String of Hearts
description: String of Hearts (Ceropegia woodii) features heart-shaped leaves on trailing stems. This charming succulent is perfect for hanging displays and is surprisingly easy to propagate from cuttings.
shortDescription: Heart-shaped leaves on trailing stems
careInstructions: Bright light enhances pink coloration. Tubers form along stems.

name: Barrel Cactus
description: The classic Barrel Cactus (Echinocactus) forms a perfect sphere covered in prominent spines. This slow-growing cactus requires minimal care and adds architectural interest to succulent collections.
shortDescription: Classic spherical cactus with prominent spines
careInstructions: Full sun essential. Water very sparingly in winter.

name: Prickly Pear
description: Prickly Pear Cactus (Opuntia) forms flat paddle-shaped segments and produces colorful flowers. This hardy cactus is extremely drought-tolerant and perfect for xeriscaping.
shortDescription: Hardy cactus with flat paddle segments
careInstructions: Extremely drought tolerant. Handle with care due to spines.

name: Christmas Cactus
description: Christmas Cactus (Schlumbergera) produces beautiful flowers in winter. Unlike desert cacti, this forest cactus prefers some humidity and indirect light. Perfect for holiday decorating.
shortDescription: Winter-flowering cactus perfect for holidays
careInstructions: Unlike desert cacti - prefers humidity and regular watering.

name: Gasteria Ox Tongue
description: Gasteria (Ox Tongue) is a South African indigenous succulent with thick, tongue-shaped leaves marked with white spots. Very hardy and perfect for shaded succulent gardens.
shortDescription: South African indigenous succulent for shade
careInstructions: Tolerates more shade than most succulents. Very drought tolerant.

name: Lithops Living Stones
description: Lithops (Living Stones) are fascinating succulents that mimic stones. These unique plants flower annually and require special care with distinct dry and growing seasons. Perfect for succulent enthusiasts.
shortDescription: Fascinating stone-mimicking succulents
careInstructions: Complex watering cycle. Dry period essential for survival.

name: Ceramic Pot Small
description: Small ceramic pot perfect for desk plants and small spaces. Features drainage hole and saucer. Available in neutral colors that complement any décor. Durable ceramic construction ensures long-lasting use.
shortDescription: Small ceramic pot with drainage hole
careInstructions: High-quality ceramic construction with proper drainage.

name: Ceramic Pot Medium
description: Medium ceramic pot ideal for most houseplants. Features modern design with drainage system. Perfect size for statement plants while fitting on most surfaces. Quality glazed finish resists fading.
shortDescription: Medium ceramic pot for houseplants
careInstructions: Includes saucer for surface protection.

name: Ceramic Pot Large
description: Large ceramic pot for floor plants and statement pieces. Premium glazed finish with excellent drainage. Perfect for larger plants like Monsteras and Fiddle Leaf Figs. Heavy-duty construction.
shortDescription: Large ceramic pot for floor plants
careInstructions: Premium quality with excellent drainage system.

name: Terracotta Pot Small
description: Classic terracotta pot perfect for herbs and small plants. Natural clay material provides excellent drainage and breathability. Traditional style that never goes out of fashion. Ideal for Mediterranean plants.
shortDescription: Classic terracotta pot for herbs
careInstructions: Natural clay promotes healthy root growth.

name: Terracotta Pot Medium
description: Medium terracotta pot with natural clay finish. Excellent for plants that prefer well-draining soil. Weather-resistant and suitable for indoor or outdoor use. Timeless design complements any garden style.
shortDescription: Medium terracotta pot for indoor/outdoor use
careInstructions: Weather-resistant natural clay construction.

name: Terracotta Pot Large
description: Large terracotta pot for substantial plants. Natural clay construction with excellent drainage properties. Perfect for outdoor herb gardens or large indoor plants. Develops beautiful patina over time.
shortDescription: Large terracotta pot for substantial plants
careInstructions: Develops natural patina with age and use.

name: Hanging Macrame Planter
description: Handcrafted macrame plant hanger perfect for trailing plants. Made from natural cotton rope with adjustable length. Adds bohemian style to any space while showcasing your plants beautifully.
shortDescription: Handcrafted macrame plant hanger
careInstructions: Natural cotton rope with adjustable hanging length.

name: Self-Watering Pot Medium
description: Innovative self-watering pot with built-in reservoir. Perfect for busy plant parents or frequent travelers. Water indicator shows when refilling is needed. Maintains optimal moisture levels automatically.
shortDescription: Self-watering pot with reservoir system
careInstructions: Built-in water level indicator for easy monitoring.

name: Self-Watering Pot Large
description: Large self-watering pot for bigger plants. Advanced water reservoir system ensures consistent moisture. Ideal for thirsty plants or when you're away. Modern design complements contemporary interiors.
shortDescription: Large self-watering pot for bigger plants
careInstructions: Advanced reservoir system for consistent moisture.

name: Decorative Basket Small
description: Natural woven basket perfect for plant displays. Water-resistant liner protects surfaces. Adds texture and warmth to any room. Versatile design works with various plant sizes and décor styles.
shortDescription: Natural woven basket with water-resistant liner
careInstructions: Water-resistant liner protects furniture surfaces.

name: Decorative Basket Large
description: Large decorative basket for floor plants. Handwoven natural materials with protective liner. Perfect for hiding plastic pots while adding organic texture. Sustainable and eco-friendly choice.
shortDescription: Large decorative basket for floor plants
careInstructions: Handwoven from sustainable natural materials.

name: Potting Soil Premium
description: Premium potting mix formulated for indoor plants. Contains perlite for drainage and organic matter for nutrition. Sterile and pest-free. Perfect pH balance for most houseplants. 5L bag provides excellent value.
shortDescription: Premium indoor plant potting mix - 5L
careInstructions: Sterile and pest-free with perfect pH balance.

name: Succulent Soil Mix
description: Specialized soil mix for succulents and cacti. Fast-draining formula prevents root rot. Contains sand and perlite for optimal drainage. Pre-mixed and ready to use. Essential for succulent health.
shortDescription: Fast-draining succulent and cacti soil mix - 5L
careInstructions: Fast-draining formula prevents root rot in succulents.

name: Liquid Fertilizer
description: Balanced liquid fertilizer for all houseplants. Easy-to-use formula promotes healthy growth and vibrant foliage. Dilute with water for monthly feeding. Suitable for all plant types. 500ml bottle.
shortDescription: Balanced liquid plant fertilizer - 500ml
careInstructions: Promotes healthy growth and vibrant foliage color.

name: Growth Hormone
description: Rooting hormone for plant propagation. Encourages faster root development in cuttings. Perfect for expanding your plant collection. Professional-grade formula used by nurseries. 100ml bottle.
shortDescription: Rooting hormone for plant propagation - 100ml
careInstructions: Professional-grade formula for faster root development.

name: Neem Oil Organic
description: Organic neem oil for natural pest control. Safe for indoor use and effective against common plant pests. Concentrated formula - dilute before use. Chemical-free alternative for plant health. 250ml bottle.
shortDescription: Organic neem oil pest control - 250ml
careInstructions: Chemical-free natural pest control solution.

name: Plant Food Sticks
description: Convenient plant food sticks for easy feeding. Slow-release formula provides nutrients for up to 8 weeks. Simply insert into soil near roots. Perfect for busy plant parents. Pack of 10 sticks.
shortDescription: Slow-release plant food sticks - Pack of 10
careInstructions: Slow-release formula feeds plants for up to 8 weeks.

name: Copper Watering Can
description: Elegant copper watering can with 1L capacity. Beautiful patina finish that develops character over time. Comfortable handle and perfect spout for precise watering. Functional art for plant lovers.
shortDescription: Elegant copper watering can - 1L capacity
careInstructions: Beautiful patina finish develops character over time.

name: Steel Watering Can
description: Durable steel watering can with powder-coated finish. Rust-resistant and long-lasting. Ergonomic design with comfortable grip. Fine-nose spout for gentle watering. Professional quality for serious gardeners.
shortDescription: Durable steel watering can with powder coating
careInstructions: Rust-resistant with ergonomic comfortable grip design.

name: Pruning Shears Professional
description: Professional-grade pruning shears with sharp stainless steel blades. Comfortable ergonomic handles reduce hand fatigue. Perfect for precise cuts on stems up to 2cm diameter. Essential tool for plant care.
shortDescription: Professional pruning shears with stainless steel blades
careInstructions: Sharp stainless steel blades for precise clean cuts.

name: Plant Mister Brass
description: Elegant brass plant mister for humidity-loving plants. Fine mist spray perfect for tropical plants and air plants. Stylish addition to your plant care routine. Easy-squeeze trigger mechanism.
shortDescription: Elegant brass plant mister for humidity
careInstructions: Fine mist spray ideal for tropical and air plants.

name: Plant Mister Copper
description: Beautiful copper plant mister with vintage appeal. Creates fine mist for leaf cleaning and humidity. Develops natural patina over time. Perfect for orchids, ferns, and tropical plants.
shortDescription: Beautiful copper plant mister with vintage appeal
careInstructions: Develops natural patina and creates perfect fine mist.

name: Soil Moisture Meter
description: Digital soil moisture meter for accurate watering. Takes guesswork out of plant care. Easy-to-read LCD display shows moisture levels. Battery-powered with auto-shutoff. Essential for plant health.
shortDescription: Digital soil moisture meter with LCD display
careInstructions: Accurate digital readings eliminate watering guesswork.

name: LED Grow Light
description: Full-spectrum LED grow light for indoor plants. Energy-efficient and long-lasting. Adjustable height and brightness settings. Perfect for low-light areas or supplemental lighting. Promotes healthy growth year-round.
shortDescription: Full-spectrum LED grow light for indoor plants
careInstructions: Energy-efficient with adjustable height and brightness settings.

name: Bamboo Plant Stakes
description: Natural bamboo plant stakes for supporting tall plants. Set of 5 stakes in various lengths. Eco-friendly and biodegradable. Perfect for training climbing plants or supporting heavy stems.
shortDescription: Natural bamboo plant stakes - Set of 5
careInstructions: Eco-friendly biodegradable support for climbing plants.

column33: Bright light maintains colors. Water at soil level to avoid leaf rot.

name: Liquid Fertilizer
description: Balanced liquid fertilizer for all houseplants. Easy-to-use formula promotes healthy growth and vibrant foliage. Dilute with water for monthly feeding. Suitable for all plant types. 500ml bottle.
shortDescription: Balanced liquid plant fertilizer - 500ml
careInstructions: Promotes healthy growth and vibrant foliage color.

name: Growth Hormone
description: Rooting hormone for plant propagation. Encourages faster root development in cuttings. Perfect for expanding your plant collection. Professional-grade formula used by nurseries. 100ml bottle.
shortDescription: Rooting hormone for plant propagation - 100ml
careInstructions: Professional-grade formula for faster root development.

name: Neem Oil Organic
description: Organic neem oil for natural pest control. Safe for indoor use and effective against common plant pests. Concentrated formula - dilute before use. Chemical-free alternative for plant health. 250ml bottle.
shortDescription: Organic neem oil pest control - 250ml
careInstructions: Chemical-free natural pest control solution.

name: Plant Food Sticks
description: Convenient plant food sticks for easy feeding. Slow-release formula provides nutrients for up to 8 weeks. Simply insert into soil near roots. Perfect for busy plant parents. Pack of 10 sticks.
shortDescription: Slow-release plant food sticks - Pack of 10
careInstructions: Slow-release formula feeds plants for up to 8 weeks.

name: Copper Watering Can
description: Elegant copper watering can with 1L capacity. Beautiful patina finish that develops character over time. Comfortable handle and perfect spout for precise watering. Functional art for plant lovers.
shortDescription: Elegant copper watering can - 1L capacity
careInstructions: Beautiful patina finish develops character over time.

name: Steel Watering Can
description: Durable steel watering can with powder-coated finish. Rust-resistant and long-lasting. Ergonomic design with comfortable grip. Fine-nose spout for gentle watering. Professional quality for serious gardeners.
shortDescription: Durable steel watering can with powder coating
careInstructions: Rust-resistant with ergonomic comfortable grip design.

name: Pruning Shears Professional
description: Professional-grade pruning shears with sharp stainless steel blades. Comfortable ergonomic handles reduce hand fatigue. Perfect for precise cuts on stems up to 2cm diameter. Essential tool for plant care.
shortDescription: Professional pruning shears with stainless steel blades
careInstructions: Sharp stainless steel blades for precise clean cuts.

name: Plant Mister Brass
description: Elegant brass plant mister for humidity-loving plants. Fine mist spray perfect for tropical plants and air plants. Stylish addition to your plant care routine. Easy-squeeze trigger mechanism.
shortDescription: Elegant brass plant mister for humidity
careInstructions: Fine mist spray ideal for tropical and air plants.

name: Plant Mister Copper
description: Beautiful copper plant mister with vintage appeal. Creates fine mist for leaf cleaning and humidity. Develops natural patina over time. Perfect for orchids, ferns, and tropical plants.
shortDescription: Beautiful copper plant mister with vintage appeal
careInstructions: Develops natural patina and creates perfect fine mist.

name: Soil Moisture Meter
description: Digital soil moisture meter for accurate watering. Takes guesswork out of plant care. Easy-to-read LCD display shows moisture levels. Battery-powered with auto-shutoff. Essential for plant health.
shortDescription: Digital soil moisture meter with LCD display
careInstructions: Accurate digital readings eliminate watering guesswork.

name: LED Grow Light
description: Full-spectrum LED grow light for indoor plants. Energy-efficient and long-lasting. Adjustable height and brightness settings. Perfect for low-light areas or supplemental lighting. Promotes healthy growth year-round.
shortDescription: Full-spectrum LED grow light for indoor plants
careInstructions: Energy-efficient with adjustable height and brightness settings.

name: Bamboo Plant Stakes
description: Natural bamboo plant stakes for supporting tall plants. Set of 5 stakes in various lengths. Eco-friendly and biodegradable. Perfect for training climbing plants or supporting heavy stems.
shortDescription: Natural bamboo plant stakes - Set of 5
careInstructions: Eco-friendly biodegradable support for climbing plants.
